We Waive the Fee
You Drive for Free
  • At least 2 Ad-Supported Hours of FREE Driving
  • 100% Electric and Emission-Free
  • Available in Los Angeles and selected regions
Find, book, and start using electric cars for free.
By clicking “Get Started”, you agree to WaiveCar’s Terms & Condition and Privacy Policy.
Riding with WaiveCar
Book
Use the app to locate a WaiveCar near you. To reserve one, tap ‘Book WaiveCar’.
Drive
Unlock your car with the app. Drive safely and enjoy your two or more free hours.
Park
Ready to hop out? Depending on the charge level, leave it in a legal parking spot or drop it off at a charging station.
Return
Finish by tapping ‘End Ride’ and following the in app step-by-step exit checklist. Your ride is now complete.
Need More Time?
When your free hours are over, the ride doesn’t have to be.
Keep going for only
$5.99/hr
Our Partnership with Hyundai
Hyundai teams up with WaiveCar to offer IONIQ electric vehicles as part of our free car-sharing program.
